md:
giải nghĩa từ "graphics" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

**Graphics** (noun)

* Meaning: đồ họa, hình ảnh
* Part of speech: noun
* Example sentence: "The graphics in this video game are amazing."
* Related words: image, picture, visual, illustration
* Antonyms: text, audio

**Graphics** (plural noun)

* Meaning: đồ họa, hình ảnh (đa số)
* Part of speech: plural noun
* Example sentence: "The graphics on this website are not loading properly."
* Related words: images, pictures, visuals, illustrations
* Antonyms: texts, audios

In the context of computer science, **graphics** refers to the visual elements of a user interface, such as images, icons, and animations. In a broader sense, **graphics** can also refer to any visual representation of information, such as charts, diagrams, and illustrations.

In the example sentence "The graphics in this video game are amazing.", **graphics** refers to the visual elements of the game, such as the characters, environments, and special effects.

In the example sentence "The graphics on this website are not loading properly.", **graphics** refers to the visual elements of the website, such as images, icons, and animations.
